snippet.textDisplay:
That’s crazy! She’s crazy! There are many women that abuse men and then cry wolf for the attention.
I never heard anyone say John Depp ever hurt them. All I can say is everything we do will eventually come out in the light & God doesn’t like ugly. What you plan for someone else will come back to bite you! Oh and trying to involve his children was really crossing the line, I seriously hope they’re alright. I have no respect for anyone trying to hurt children, no matter how old. God bless John Depp & his family! 💞🕊
snippet.textOriginal:
That’s crazy!  She’s crazy! There are many women that abuse men and then cry wolf for the attention. 
I never heard anyone say John Depp ever hurt them. All I can say is everything we do will eventually come out in the light & God doesn’t like ugly. What you plan for someone else will come back to bite you! Oh and trying to involve his children was really crossing the line, I seriously hope they’re alright. I have no respect for anyone trying to hurt children, no matter how old. God bless John Depp & his family! 💞🕊

snippet.textDisplay:
@JOHNNY DEPP I've died and gone to heaven, I got a reply from Johnny! Thank you! You don't deserve this, kiddie creepers deserve the cancel culture, Peoples relationships good, bad or ugly should not be anyone else's business. I can understand how being so popular can be very lonely especially when they are tearing up your life. I know I'm a nobody in the grand scheme of things but if you ever need a friend in Vegas I'm here. And I promise not to fan girl you, I've been married to long to be like that. Real been there done that life lived person here. Just know you are cared about. Manson too. 🤗 Hugs.
Julie Barr-Thoms 😺😺
snippet.textOriginal:
@JOHNNY DEPP  I've died and gone to heaven, I got a reply from Johnny! Thank you! You don't deserve this, kiddie creepers deserve the cancel culture, Peoples relationships good, bad or ugly should not be anyone else's business. I can understand how being so popular can be very lonely especially when they are tearing up your life.  I know I'm a nobody in the grand scheme of things but if you ever need a friend in Vegas I'm here.  And I promise not to fan girl you,  I've been married to long to be like that.  Real been there done that life lived person here. Just know you are cared about.  Manson too. 🤗 Hugs.
Julie Barr-Thoms 😺😺
